overview: The Apartment: About Last Night centres around Ayanna, Janelle and Michelle; three women in their mid-twenties living together in an upscale apartment in Maraval and all their new experiences as burgeoning adults and roommates. The Pilot movie explores all the possible scenarios and situations that often occur when people (particularly women) live together and share a confined space.
tagline: How close is too close? The Apartment...enter if you dare!
title: The Apartment: About Last Night
